Package com.thesmartweb.lshrank

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationClient
    This class has been translate to scala.
    APIconn
    Class to connect to various APIs, to establish http and https connections
    BingResults
    Class to get results from Bing
    CheckConvergence
    Class to check the convergence percentage between the words of two rounds
    CombinationGenerator
    Method to Systematically generate combinations.
    Combinations_Engine
    A class that is used to create all the possible combinations
    DandelionEntities
    Class to deal with the semantic entities and concepts (categories) of Dandelion named Entity Extraction API check more
    DataManipulation
    Class that contains methods that manipulate different data for LSHrank
    DBpediaSpotlightClient
    Simple web service-based annotation client for DBpedia Spotlight.
    Diffbot
    class for diffbot article apiu usage
    ElasticGetWordList
    Class that contains method that retrieve words from an index in the cluster of ElasticSearch where the content is saved
    GoogleResults
    Class for the Google Search API
    JSONparsing
    Class for parsing JSON responses
    LDAcall
    Class for the use of Latent Dirichlet Allocation
    LDAsemStats
    Class to get stats related to the content generated by LDA
    LDAtopicsWords
    Class for LDA's results manipulation
    Lemmatizer
    Class to perform lemmatization using Stanford Core NLP
    LinksParseAnalysis
    Class to analyze the urls of the results of the Search Engine APIs
    Main
    Main class of LSHrank that gets the settings and get the results of every iteration.
    Moz
    Class to get various info using Moz API
    NWD_Analysis
    Class for Normalized Web Distance or Normalized Google distance calculation http://arxiv.org/abs/0905.4039 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Normalized_Google_distance
    NWD_total
    Class for Normalized Web Distance calculation
    PermutationGenerator
    Systematically generate permutations.
    ReadInput
    Class to read the input files
    Search_analysis
    Class for analysis of all the queries through Search APIs and capturing of the result statistics
    Sensebot
    Class to deal with the various functionalities related to Sensebot
    Sindice
    Class for the various Sindice functionalities
    StemmerSnow
    Class for using snowball stemmer
    StHttpRequest
    Simple HTTP Request implementation used for Yahoo! Search API
    Stopwords
    Class that can test whether a given string is a stop word.
    TFIDF
    Class for TFIDF analysis
    Total_analysis
    Class of the main algorithm functionalities
    TwitterAnalysis
    Class for using Twitter related info through Twitter4j
    VisibilityScore
    Class regarding Visibility score http://www.advancedwebranking.com/user-guide/html/en/ch08s06.html
    WebParser
    Class related to the parsing procedures of HTML files by our mechanism
    YahooConn
    Sample code to use Yahoo! Search BOSS Please include the following libraries 1.
    YahooEntityCategory
    Class related to the Yahoo! entities and categories
    YahooResults
    Class for the Yahoo! Search API
